title: FS/FT: T205 Lot - All HOF's and SP's w/Cobb, Matty, Young, Wilhelm *FINAL PRICE DROP*
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T205 Lot - All HOF's and SP's w/Cobb, Matty, Young, Wilhelm *FINAL PRICE DROP*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T205 cards available for sale or trade. All cards are HOF's or short prints. Payment via any method you prefer. All prices are delivered.  I would be glad to trade for anything I need from a number of different sets, so please feel free to send me your tradelist.  Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier reading):

Bender (Polar Bear) - $20
Bresnahan - $25
Cady - $28
Clarke - $60
Cobb - $550
Evers - $225
Ford (Polar Bear) - $16
Ford (Piedmont) - $35
Hoblitzell (name correct, no "Cin") - $350
Mathewson (spots of paper loss on front and back) -$110
Mathewson (spot of paper loss in lower left corner of front) - $150
Speaker (raw) - $40
Speaker (PSA 2) - $120
Tinker (Piedmont) - $28
Tinker (Sweet Caporal) - $33
Wheat (possible slight trim on right edge) - $30
K. White (Piedmont) - $20
K. White (Polar Bear) - $9
Wilhelm ("suffe ed", possible very slight trim although card measures identical to my graded copy...will give full refund if it does not grade numerically) - $300
Young (tiny pinhole near top border) - $215

Hi Marc,

I'll take the Joss. Please advise how you would like payment.

Thanks,

Turner Engle

Hi,
I'd like the PSA 1 Chance and the SGC 1 Bender
Marc ill take the sgc poor wallace w/cap $25 pm info so i can  send payment thx octavio
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks!
Bump for a final price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
